mapper.select: select company_info.id, company_info.company_id, company_info.company_name, company_info.phone from company_info company_info join pre_project_company_set pre_project_company_set on company_info.company_id = pre_project_company_set.company_id where pre_project_company_set.project_no = #{projectNo};

select info.lbs,info.address,info.company_name,info.company_id, info.telephone,info.legal_name,info.legal_phone,info.city_code, info.province_code,info.area_code, province.province_name, city.city_name, area.area_name from company_info info left join province province on info.province_code = province.province_code left join city city on info.city_code = city.city_code left join area area on info.area_code = area.area_code where info.company_id = #{companyId}
